result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Megan Catherine Cronin

defendant.name: Cronin, Megan Catherine
defendant.address: 30605 Cty Rd H, Webb Lake, WI 54830

records.addlTxt: Letter to Judge from Attorney Johansen re: withdrawal of counsel

9:48 AM Attorney Jamy Richard Johansen in court for Megan Catherine Cronin.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Att Johansen- no information
State notes last appearance was voluntary warrant appearance. State requests warrants and bond forfeited.
Att Johansen- no response
Court orders warrants and bail forfeited
Prior $250 cash reinstated. Court orders additional $750 cash bond on this file. Condition of no contact with victim one or their address.

1:36 PM Prosecuting attorney Angela M Wilson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Megan Catherine Cronin in court. Ellen Craker appears with defendant.
Att. Craker verifies address is correct. 
Court quashes warrants. Questions nonappearance
Att. Craker- She believed she didn't have to appear for status, bond sheets didn't have the status conference
State- requests bond be reinstated, requests additional $750 on 22CF115 and additional $350 on 22CT41. Not the first FTA on these files
Att Craker argues against additional cash bail. Could post $400 additional total.
 Court reinstates prior bond, orders $750 additional in 22CF115 and additional $350 on 22CT41. Conditions to continue.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 09:45 am.

3:25 PM Calling cases 22CT41 and 22CF115, 22TR651
Defendant Megan Catherine Cronin not in court.  Attorney Chad C La Lor in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State has no information, requests warrant in both files and to remove PH for felony case.  Requests default on tr.
geographic CF WI, St Louis and Carlton County.  CT WI only
Court orders warrant and forf of bail/bond and default on tr.
No contact with Victim 1 or address.

2:03 PM Defendant Megan Catherine Cronin in court.  Attorney Peter Kruger in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Address verified as correct on complaint.  Court recites charges against defendant and possible penalties. Defendant advised of right to consult an attorney. Defendant pleads not guilty.  Court accepts pleas. Court quashes warrants based on non appearance, questions non appearance. Defendant indicates was not aware that charges were refiled and was not aware of court dates. 
State indicates Summons sent out for CT file, did not appear so warrant issued. Asking for $250 cash in 22CF115, no contact with Victim 1 or address. On 22CT41, asking for $150 cash, no driving without valid permit or license. 
Defendant indicates can post that.
Court orders on 22cf115, $250 cash. In 22CT41, $150 cash.  Conditions in 22CF115, no contact with Victim 1 or address.  On 22CT41, no driving without valid license or permit.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

2:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Peter James Marvin Kruger in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Megan Catherine Cronin not in court. 
State sent summons on CT file, wasn't summoned on CF file, requests warrant on CT file
Court- reset TR case to 4/12/22 at 2:00( time of citation). Orders warrants on CT and CF files
ID Key, Motion, and Order to Seal
